name: Brand and Design System Kit V1.1
description:
Component based Starter Kit for building your Brand Style Guide.


Oh, and if you've enjoyed the plugin and are feeling generous, you can always... https://www.buymeacoffee.com/jadgdesign


How it works?

1. Create new logomark (symbol)

2. Setup brand name

3. Define color styles and typography


The first version contains the following items:

Brand Style

  • Intro Page
  • Mission Statement
  • Logomark Construction
  • Logo Construction
  • Mono Color Logo
  • Alternative Backgrounds
  • Clearspace
  • Minimum Size
  • How Not To Use Logo
  • Thumbnail Mark
  • Main Colors
  • Color Usage
  • Typography

Foundations

  • Intro Page
  • Colour
  • Typography
  • Layout
  • Spacing
  • Icons
  • Hitos

Components

  • Logo
  • Heading
  • Paragraphs
  • Icons
  • Buttons
  • Tooltip
  • Image
  • Video
  • Forms
  • Alerts
  • Bagdes
  • Avatars
  • Modal
